items.sentence: I had no idea that you were so good at playing the guitar.
Tom doesn\'t have to eat anything he doesn\'t want to eat.
Tom doesn\'t know it yet, but he\'s going to get laid off.
Tom is running because he doesn\'t want to miss his train.
I wanted to give you a chance to explain why you did that.
You\'re the only other person who knows why Tom was fired.
Tom didn\'t buy the dress that Mary wanted him to buy her.
Tom usually doesn\'t eat anything before he goes on stage.
I\'ve already done everything that you\'ve asked me to do.
What do you think Tom was doing out in the woods that day?
What do you think of the way Tom has been behaving lately?
Tom knew that Mary couldn\'t do what she was trying to do.
Tom knew that Mary would never do what she said she\'d do.
Tom kept his gun pointed at Mary and told her not to move.
Tom knew that Mary told everyone she was going to do that.
I can\'t think of any place I\'d rather be than in Boston.
I assume this isn\'t the best time to ask for a promotion.
There was a bowling trophy on the shelf above Tom\'s desk.
I can\'t remember anything about what happened that night.
I can\'t do that with you because I don\'t have any money.
